title: PMS 2.0 545 - NFL Thanksgiving Preview, Coach Us Up With Chuck Pagano, Jonathan Taylor, Robert Mathis In Studio, Ian Rapoport, & AJ Hawk
description: On today's show, Pat, AJ Hawk, and the boys dive into every game on Thanksgiving Day including Bears/Lions, Raiders/Cowboys, and Bills/Saints and make their picks for the games and Pat unveils a new PMI super boost for the Bills on Thanksgiving night available only on FanDuel, before making way for four great guests as we prepare for Thanksgiving. First, Colts Running Back and leading MVP candidate, Jonathan Taylor (22:53-38:52). Next to chat about everything we need to know in terms of who's playing and who isn't on Thanksgiving, and the big weekend ahead in the NFL (49:25-1:21:02). Later, Colts legend, a guy who is going into the Colts Ring of Honor this weekend and Hall of Fame semi-finalist, Robert Mathis joins Pat and AJ in studio (1:21:04-1:46:39, 1:47:59-2:09:00). Lastly, joining Pat and AJ Hawk as he does every week to talk about the week that was in the NFL and get us prepared for Thanksgiving, former Head Coach of the Indianapolis Colts, Chuck Pagano (2:09:02-2:34:17). Make sure you subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow and listen every day on Mad Dog Radio, Sirius XM Channel 82. We appreciate you all for listening, have an incredible Thanksgiving with your family. Cheers.
dc:creator: Pat McAfee
